project1.title: Sports-Roster
project1.description: A Project that allows the user to view,edit, and add players to the NAshville Predators NHL team.

project2.title: Sandwich Maker
project2.description: This project allows a user to select sandwich items and view a final price.

project3.title: Nutshell Star-Destroyer
project3.description: A project that explores fetching and displaying firebase data. Allows the user to add edit and delete information from the Star Wars Imperial Database.

project4.title: Shark-Attack!
project4.description: This is a project that explores what might happen if a Shark attacked Nss Night Cohort E10.
